titleNullable: AFRICA: Soil Analysis for iSDAsoil Mapping
subtitleNullable: In-depth soil analysis powering iSDAsoil maps across Africa.
descriptionNullable:
This dataset is available under a CC-BY-4.0 licence. Please cite using the following DOI: https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/A69R5 --------------------------------- This dataset provides comprehensive soil analysis specifically tailored for Africa, meticulously prepared in an analysis-ready format. It serves as the cornerstone for training models instrumental in crafting the cutting-edge iSDAsoil maps. |column_name|description|unit| | --- | --- | |longitude|Latitude of soil sampling location|decimal degrees| |latitude|Longitude of soil sampling location|decimal degrees| |start_date|Combined with end_date to indicate the timespan
over which data were collected|| |end_date|Combined with start_date to indicate the timespan
over which data were collected|| |source|Reference to the original source of the dataset.
More information is available upon request.|| |horizon_lower|Depth of bottom of sampled layer|cm| |horizon_upper|Depth of top of sampled layer|cm| |aluminium_extractable|"Aluminum, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg| |boron_extractable|"Boron, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg| |calcium_extractable|"Calcium, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg| |carbon_organic|Organic Carbon by combustion after acidification|g/kg| |carbon_total|Total Carbon by combustion|g/kg| |copper_extractable|"Copper, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg| |electrical_conductivity|"Electrical conductivity, Saturation Extract"|dS/m| |iron_extractable|"Iron, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg| |magnesium_extractable|"Magnesium, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg| |manganese_extractable|"Manganese, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg| |nitrogen_total|Total Nitrogen by combustion|g/kg| |ph|"pH, measured in 1:1 soil-water suspension"|| |phosphorus_extractable|"Phosphorus, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg| |potassium_etractable|"Potassium, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg| |sodium_extractable|"Sodium, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg| |sulphur_extractable|"Sulphur, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg| |zn_mehlich3|"Zinc, Mehlich3 extraction"|mg/kg|
